uiDefinition.description: The API Key for this api

properties.description: Cyberday is an information security management system, where one key part is managing the data assets of a company. Often the most important data asset are the data systems used to process data and run operations. Sometimes organizations already have some other locations for asset listings. This connector helps to bring info of all assets to Cyberday, so the asset information and the decided safeguards to deploy can live in the same place.
